sentences: Héritier Bondongo Kabeya (born 29 August 1982), known by his stage name as Héritier Watanabe is a Congolese singer-songwriter, dancer from Kinshasa Democratic Republic of the Congo.

he was a member of Wenge Musica Maison Mère from 2001 to 2015 he diced to quit the group and signed with Obouo Music Label of David Monsoh and release his first single title  "B. M" in July 2016 and his first album "Carrière d'honneur - Retirada" in November 2016.
